class.comment: Utility class for getting built-in Attributes.

FOLLOW_RANGE.comment: The maximum distance between an entity and its target to follow.

KNOCKBACK_RESISTANCE.comment: How resistant this entity is to knockback attacks.

MOVEMENT_SPEED.comment: The movement speed of this entity.

FLYING_SPEED.comment: The flying speed of this entity.

ATTACK_DAMAGE.comment: How much raw damage an entity will deal by themselves on a single attack.

ATTACK_KNOCKBACK.comment: How much raw knockback an entity will deal by themselves on a single attack.

ATTACK_SPEED.comment: How fast an entity can attack, reducing its attack cooldown.

ARMOR.comment: The armor value for this entity.

ARMOR_TOUGHNESS.comment: The armor toughness value for this entity.

LUCK.comment: The luck value for this entity, determining how lucky it is.

MAX_ABSORPTION.comment: The maximum amount of absorption this entity can have.

SPAWN_REINFORCEMENTS_CHANCE.comment: The percentage chance of spawning additional mobs of this type nearby when attacked. This is mostly used for a Zombie and its variants.

JUMP_STRENGTH.comment: Determines how high a Horse-type entity can jump by itself.
